plugin.name: gconfelements
plugin.description: elements wrapping the GStreamer/GConf audio/video output settings

element.name: gconfaudiosink
element.description: Audio sink embedding the GConf-settings for audio output
element.author: Jan Schmidt <thaytan@mad.scientist.com>

element.name: gconfaudiosrc
element.description: Audio source embedding the GConf-settings for audio input
element.author: GStreamer maintainers <gstreamer-devel@lists.sourceforge.net>

element.name: gconfvideosink
element.description: Video sink embedding the GConf-settings for video output
element.author: GStreamer maintainers <gstreamer-devel@lists.sourceforge.net>

element.name: gconfvideosrc
element.description: Video source embedding the GConf-settings for video input
element.author: GStreamer maintainers <gstreamer-devel@lists.sourceforge.net>
